title.rendered: Top 21 Machine Learning Development Companies Supporting SME & Enterprises ML Adoption

content.rendered:
Machine learning global investment is expected to grow at a rate of 44.1% CAGR from 2016 to 2024 and increase up to 8.81 billion. Altogether, Machine learning has become a vital tactic for organizations in order to drive customer engagement, increase ROI, and gain competitive advantages.

Currently, the Machine Learning industry has received adoption worldwide and is thriving as a major technological advancement in data generation & analysis. The major driving factors are improved customer data insight, trend analysis & forecasting, and enhanced business operations. 

In the endeavor to infuse this technology, machine learning companies are supporting both large and small enterprises. That is boosting its significance in the current marketplace.

Image source 

Netflix, Upwork, Google, YouTube, and many other giant brands use AI and machine learning algorithms. If you are thinking about infusing machine learning and AI algorithms within your business platforms, then it is essential to go along with an innovative and value-driven approach. 

Hire An Innovative Machine Learning Development Company

Finding an innovation-driven Machine learning development company is hard when almost each of them is promising the best services. However, not all of them have the potential to provide the required solutions specific to business needs. To help you, I have prepared a list of top machine learning companies. 

I have picked these companies by collecting data from several trusted forums and websites. Besides, I have considered the projects they have delivered in the past and feedback from their clients. Moreover, I have considered the following parameters as well. 

  • Experience (more than 8 years)
  • Expertise in IT development services 
  • Previous clients 
  • Recognition gained in the market
  • Excellency and offered support

And much more, I hope this list will help you hire machine learning developers deft in crafting business-oriented solutions that can drive revenue generation and sales for your business.

Ready To Take Your Business To The Next Level?

Get the best machine learning services for your business needs.

Reach Us to Know More

Top Machine Learning App Development Companies To Plan Your Next Project 

1. PixelCrayons

PixelCrayons is a top-rated machine learning development company with over 19 years of experience in the industry. The company has worked with numerous SMEs and enterprises, providing them with high-quality Machine Learning solutions that drive business growth. PixelCrayons’ team of expert developers has experience working with various industries, including healthcare, finance, e-commerce, and more.

The company has several certifications, including ISO 9001:2015, ISO 27001:2013, and CMMI Level 3, which are a testament to its commitment to delivering top-notch Machine Learning services. PixelCrayons’ developers are also skilled in advanced ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras, as well as programming languages like Python and R.

They are experts in developing custom ML models that cater to specific business needs. The company also follows an agile development process that ensures the timely delivery of ML solutions while maintaining the highest quality standards. PixelCrayons’ ML services are also cost-effective, making them an excellent choice for SMEs looking to adopt ML without breaking the bank.

  • Founded: 2004
  • Price: Starting from $25 / hr
  • Expertise: Software Engineering, Digital Transformation, Digital Marketing, eCommerce Development, Backend Development, Frontend Development, Blockchain

Why choose?

  • 100% client satisfaction
  • In-depth domain knowledge
  • Result-driven approach
  • Integrity & transparency
  • Quality & security adherence

Major Clients:

Jackson, Infosys, eatigo, Puma, Spinny, eBay, Vodafone

2. ValueCoders

Being a known IT outsourcing and machine learning solutions company, it is taking ML-enabled application development at the top with impressive innovation in this space. With its team of ML application developers, it is one of the best ML and AI innovations providing companies that cater to world-class solutions. 

For years, ValueCoders is engaged in delivering solutions and has delivered 4500+ projects successfully with its team of innovation-driven developers trained in different programming languages and technologies. With 99% customer retention, it has won various recognition and awards from Global leaders like Deloitte, NASSCOM, ASIA RED HERRING, and more.

In the field of machine learning services, the company is engaged in crafting incredible solutions that can help businesses to provide quality customer support, data storage and analysis, forecasting, and much more. Solutions developed by the company are able to interpret complex data, detect patterns and trends in data, and develop & integrate machine engines.

If you are striving to create ML-enabled application software, you must hire a machine learning company and developers that can understand your customer needs and be able to bring your dream project into reality. 

  • Founded: 2004
  • Price: Starting from $25/hour
  • Expertise: Web application development, Blockchain application development, SharePoint services, Mobile application development, AI & ML integration, and more.

Why choose?

  • High-quality and creative team
  • Quality and security adherence
  • Result-driven approach
  • Guaranteed innovation
  • First-time right process

Major Clients:

Capgemini, Estel, SelectSpecs, Candor,  Grundfos, Novea, ZenQ, , Dubai Police, RiskLogic, EventDo Track Opinion, Rina, Trekon, Tekion. 

Empower your business with Machine Learning

Stay ahead of the competition with our Machine Learning-powered business solutions

Talk To Our Experts

The company was established in 2007. The company comprises more than 250 employees in India and Dubai and the development center in India. Their focus is to maximize Customer Value Through Innovative Solutions and Service Efficiency.

Furthermore, the team at Prolitus Technologies has delivered more than 750 projects helping in the digital transformation journey of our clients. In fact, they are one of the top Machine learning companies across the globe, and their ERP implementations have achieved a success rate of 100% to improve business processes and enhance the efficiency of various businesses. They have strong expertise in sectors such as BFSI, Government, Manufacturing, Retail, Healthcare, Education, to name a few.

  • Price: $25 — $49/hr
  • Expertise: Crypto Products, Blockchain Solutions, Wallet Development, Security Token Offering, STO Marketing Services, PoC Development, Blockchain Consulting, RPA, ERP Solutions, E-Commerce Development, Custom Software Development, Digital Transformation, Machine Learning, Business Intelligence

They help their clients outline metrics and success criteria and analyze them from the beginning. It allows companies to achieve decided goals.
